      • requiringExistingPrimaryCart

        protected java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<io.sphere.sdk.carts.Cart> requiringExistingPrimaryCart()
        Searches for an existing cart the platform otherwise the stage contains a PrimaryCartNotFoundException. A cart will not be created if it does not exist.
        Returns:
        stage

      • requiringExistingPrimaryCartWithLineItem

        protected java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<java.util.Optional<io.sphere.sdk.carts.Cart>> findPrimaryCartInCommercetoolsPlatform()
        Loads the primary cart from commercetools platform without applying side effects like updating the cart or the session.
        Returns:
        a future of the optional cart

      • updateCartCountry

        protected java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<io.sphere.sdk.carts.Cart> updateCartCountry(io.sphere.sdk.carts.Cart cart,
                                                                                           com.neovisionaries.i18n.CountryCode country)
        Updates the country of the cart, both country and shippingAddress country fields. This is necessary in order to obtain prices with tax calculation.
        Parameters:
        cart - the cart which country needs to be updated
        country - the country to set in the cart
        Returns:
        the completionStage of a cart with the given country
